DOC.brief_title: Gastric Outlet Obstructions Tailored Covered Stents GOO
DOC.detailed_description: To determine shape GOOs , stomach opacification perform use contrast medium stenting . In GOO tailor group ( 33 case ) , distal stent semi-spherical length 20 mm diameter 28 mm . The middle stent segment diameters 20 mm . The proximal end large cup-shaped stent 53.3 ± 5.5 mm diameter 15 20 mm long , whereas large funnel-shaped stent 33.6 ± 3.6 mm diameter 25 30 mm long . The control group ( 32 case ) receive standard uncovered stent ( semi-spherical , diameter 28 mm 20 mm long ) .Our hypothesis unresectable GOO tailor covered stent superior standard uncover one term stent re-obstruction stent migration . In current study efficacy safety GOO tailor covered stent treatment non-resectable GOOs cause distal gastric cancer compare standard uncovered stent .
